{{cpp/title|cosh{{small|(std::valarray)}}}}
{{cpp/numeric/valarray/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=valarray|1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
valarray&lt;T&gt; cosh( const valarray&lt;T&gt;&amp; va );
}}

For each element in {{c|va}} computes hyperbolic cosine of the value of the element.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|va|value array to apply the operation to}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
Value array containing hyperbolic cosine of the values in {{c|va}}.

===Notes===
{{cpp/numeric/valarray/notes unq|cosh}}

{{cpp/numeric/valarray/notes ret|cosh}}

===Possible implementation===
{{cpp/numeric/valarray/impl|cosh}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;cmath&gt;
#include &lt;iomanip&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;valarray&gt;

void show(const char* title, const std::valarray&lt;float&gt;&amp; data)
{
    const int w{9};
    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::setw(w) &lt;&lt; title &lt;&lt; " {{!}} ";
    for (float x : data)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; std::setw(w) &lt;&lt; x &lt;&lt; " {{!}} ";
    std::cout &lt;&lt; '\n';
}

int main()
{
    const std::valarray&lt;float&gt; x{.1, .2, .3, .4};
    const auto sinh = std::sinh(x);
    const auto cosh = std::cosh(x);
    const auto z = (cosh * cosh) - (sinh * sinh);

    show("x", x);
    show("sinh(x)", sinh);
    show("cosh(x)", cosh);
    show("z", z);
}
|output=&lt;nowiki/&gt;
        x {{!}}       0.1 {{!}}       0.2 {{!}}       0.3 {{!}}       0.4 {{!}} 
  sinh(x) {{!}}  0.100167 {{!}}  0.201336 {{!}}   0.30452 {{!}}  0.410752 {{!}} 
  cosh(x) {{!}}     1.005 {{!}}   1.02007 {{!}}   1.04534 {{!}}   1.08107 {{!}} 
        z {{!}}         1 {{!}}         1 {{!}}         1 {{!}}         1 {{!}} 
}}
